title: Financial Hold Prevents Registration
description: A student is trying to register for classes but is blocked by a financial hold on their account from an unpaid library fine.

tasks.description: When registration fails, check the student's account for any holds.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a 'Financial Hold' from the library.

tasks.description: Look up the details of the hold, finding it is for a $25 unpaid fine for a lost book.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the source and amount of the hold.

tasks.description: Transfer the student to the library services desk to pay the fine and have the hold removed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent performs a warm transfer to the correct department to resolve the root cause.
